2025-01-30.title: Shell Maintains Buyback With Extra Borrowing as Profit Drops
2025-01-30.description: Shell Plc maintained the pace of its share buybacks with additional borrowing as profit dropped by more than expected due to a weak trading performance and lower oil prices.

2025-01-30.title: Shell exits oilsands in deal with Canadian Natural Resources
2025-01-30.description: Shell Canada is exiting the oilsands and increasing its stake in the Scotford upgrader and Quest Carbon Capture and Storage. Read on

2025-01-30.title: Shell, Thebe Near $1 Billion South Africa Oil-Asset Sales Pact
2025-01-30.description: Shell Plc and its South African partner are close to ending a valuation dispute, paving the way for the sale of the oil giant’s local downstream assets for as much as $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.

2025-01-30.title: Shell Takes $1 Billion Hit on Wind Farm Trump Wants ‘Dead’
2025-01-30.description: Shell Plc said it has written off almost $1 billion and withdrawn from a US offshore wind farm as President Donald Trump seeks to stymie the industry’s development with executive orders.

2025-01-30.title: European Stocks Rise as ECB Cuts as Expected; Shell, Nokia Gain
2025-01-30.description: European stocks rose on the back of strong earnings and as a decision from the European Central Bank to cut interest rates came as expected.
